author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UK's Official Receiver Says Employment Secured For Further 456 Carillion Employees, ‍​230 Employees Made Redundant‍​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - UK‘S Official Receiver:
* WORK CONTINUING TO FIND NEW SUPPLIERS TO TAKE ON CARILLION’S CONTRACTS WITH EMPLOYMENT NOW SECURED FOR FURTHER 456 EMPLOYEES‍​
* ‍​230 CARILLION EMPLOYEES HAVE BEEN DECLARED REDUNDANT AND WILL LEAVE THE BUSINESS LATER THIS WEEK
* DISCUSSIONS WITH POTENTIAL PURCHASERS CONTINUE, EXPECT THAT NUMBER OF JOBS SAFEGUARDED THROUGH CARILLION'S LIQUIDATION WILL RISE‍​ Source ID: ( bit.ly/2BPky98 ) Further company coverage:
